about_the_game:
You are a little child, out in the wilderness. No one is around, just some unknown creatures. Find a way back home without being caught by the mythical Naddagil, preserve your sanity and never underestimate the creatures around you.

Fighting is no option!

As a little child, your only defense is to hide and avoid the Naddagil.
Always scan your surroundings for a possible escape route or a place to seek shelter. Use the environment to your advantage and avoid getting seen.

Be careful! You never know from where and when you'll get attacked.

Take care of your sanity.

It is dark out there and a lot of scary noises surround you. Remember to regulary visit safe places for a little rest and a warm fire to recover.
You never know when there will be another chance to restore.

Beware of the Naddagil!

You are entering its territory and it wont hesitate to hunt you down. You never know where it will appear next, if it is behind, infront or just one tree line away from you.

Find your way home.

There is always a way to escape, but not all of them are passable directly. Repair bridges to cross the rivers or explore a different path.

Visit safe zones.

These are the only completely safe places out there in the wilderness. They will take care of your sanity and provide a magical barrier, protecting you from any thread. But first you have to find them and bring some payment with you.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

short_description: Enter the mythical world of Naddagil: A Nordic Nightmare. In this cozy-horror game you have to guide a little child back home. But be aware, that not all creatures in this world will try to help you. Your only chance of survival is to hide and avoid the mysterious Naddagil lurking for you.
